entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'he' and 'himself'. The text mentions Harry asking a question.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: A house-elf who is described as having an ugly head and bloodshot eyes. Kreacher is instructed by Master Regulus to come back.

relationships.description: Harry looked at Kreacher with his great, bloodshot eyes.
